annotations: Albert Fried Jr. , a 59 - year - old director and holder of a 9.5 % stake in the company , was named chairman of this maker of products for the construction equipment , material handling and railroad industries .
He succeeds L.L. White Jr. , 62 , who resigned but continues as a director .
Mr. Fried also is the managing partner of Albert Fried -AMP- Co .
